itineraries.title: CARPE DIEM IN POLYNESIA – BETWEEN LAGOONS AND DORMANT VOLCANOES

visits.text: Arrival in Papeete, discovery of the waterfront and the colorful market of the Tahitian capital.
Visit to the Museum of Tahiti and Her Islands for an immersion in Polynesian culture.

activities.text: Sunset stroll on Pointe Vénus beach.

visits.text: Excursion into the interior of the island to the crater of Mount Aorai.
Stop at Faarumai waterfalls and visit to Paofai temple.

activities.text: Tahitian dance demonstration and traditional braiding workshop.

visits.text: Ferry crossing to Moorea, discovery of Opunohu Bay and the Belvedere offering a view of the mountains and lagoon.
Visit to a pineapple plantation and tropical fruit tasting.

activities.text: Snorkeling in Moorea's lagoon, observation of stingrays and multicolored fish.

visits.text: Hike to Mount Rotui for a panoramic view of Cook and Opunohu bays.
Discovery of Polynesian marae, ancient sacred places of worship.

activities.text: Sunset cruise with traditional music on board.

visits.text: Flight to Huahine, exploration of Fare village and visit to the marae of Maeva.
Discovery of Fauna Nui lake and traditional fish traps.

activities.text: Outrigger canoe tour on the lagoon and swimming on an isolated motu.

visits.text: Walk through vanilla plantations and meeting with local artisans.
Visit to Parea beaches and the wild south of Huahine.

activities.text: Observation of nurse sharks in the lagoon.

visits.text: Flight to Bora Bora and settling on the main island.
Island tour by 4x4 with panoramic stops at Mount Otemanu.

activities.text: Free diving in the turquoise lagoon, encounter with manta rays.

visits.text: Lagoon exploration by boat and stop on a private motu.
Visit to the village of Vaitape and its artisan market.

activities.text: Romantic sunset cruise with local aperitif.

itineraries.title: FRENCH POLYNESIA, THE TRIP OF A LIFETIME: BETWEEN LAGOONS, VOLCANOES AND TRADITIONS

visits.text: Papeete Market to discover crafts and local products
Notre-Dame Cathedral and stroll through downtown Papeete
Museum of Tahiti and the Islands to understand Polynesian culture

activities.text: Relaxation at Vaiava beach (PK18)
Sunset watching at Pointe Vénus

visits.text: Hike to Fautaua waterfall
Discovery of the Arahoho Blowhole

activities.text: Exploration of Papenoo valley by 4x4
Visit to marae Arahurahu, sacred archaeological site

visits.text: Boat excursion and snorkeling with stingrays and blacktip sharks
Kayak or paddle in Moorea lagoon
Whale watching (August to November) off Moorea

activities.text: Hike to Opunohu belvedere
Walk along the pineapple road

visits.text: Visit to Maeva village and its archaeological sites
Electric bike tour around the island
Visit to Huahine Pearl Farm & Pottery pearl farm

activities.text: Snorkeling trip in Huahine lagoon
Traditional canoe ride (va'a)

visits.text: Visit to Taputapuatea marae, UNESCO World Heritage site
Boat excursion on the Faaroa river
Visit to a vanilla plantation on Taha'a

activities.text: Snorkeling exploration of Taha'a's Coral Garden
Sailing cruise between Raiatea and Taha'a

visits.text: 4x4 safari in Bora Bora to discover the panoramas
Walk on Matira beach

activities.text: Sunset cruise on the lagoon
Snorkeling dans les jardins de corail

visits.text: Bike tour around Maupiti island
Climb Mount Teurafaatiu for the view over the lagoon

activities.text: Outrigger canoe excursion in the lagoon and manta ray observation
Relaxing on Tereia beach and walking across to Motu Auira
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Diving at Tiputa pass to observe dolphins and sharks
Visit to Gauguin pearl farm

activities.text: Excursion to the Blue Lagoon of Rangiroa
Discovery of Île aux Récifs south of the atoll

visits.text: Diving at the south pass of Tumakohua to observe the wall of sharks
Visit to the village of Tetamanu and its coral church

activities.text: Exploration of the pink sand beaches in the south of Fakarava
Snorkeling in the lagoon of Fakarava

visits.text: Taravao viewpoint to admire Tahiti Nui and Tahiti Iti
Vaipahi water garden and walk in the tropical vegetation

activities.text: Watching surfers at Teahupoo
Last swim on the black sand beach of Pointe Vénus

itineraries.title: FRENCH POLYNESIA: LAGOONS, MARAE AND SACRED MOUNTAINS

visits.text: Papeete market (discovering local products)
Papeete waterfront promenade and Paofai gardens

activities.text: Logistics scouting and island tour via the north coast (panoramic stops)

visits.text: Pointe de Vénus beach and island lighthouse
Arahoho Blowhole (marine geysers)

activities.text: Swimming and beach snorkeling (calm conditions)

visits.text: Marae Arahurahu (restored ceremonial site)
Mara'a cave (cavities and pools)

activities.text: Photo stops on the west coast (panoramas of Moorea)

visits.text: Vaipahi water garden (trails and waterfalls)
Taravao viewpoint (view of both bays)

activities.text: Wave observation at Teahupo'o (weather conditions permitting)

visits.text: Taharuu Beach (black sand, surfing and walking)

activities.text: Half-day lagoon excursion off Tahiti (snorkeling from boat)

visits.text: Uturoa center and port (urban discovery)

activities.text: Flight Tahiti → Raiatea (inter-island transit)

visits.text: Taputapuātea Marae (UNESCO)
Southeast coast (viewpoints over the lagoon)

activities.text: Coastal walk and swimming stops

visits.text: Faaroa Valley and river mouth

activities.text: Kayaking on Faaroa River (mangrove and botany)

visits.text: Village of Haamene and bay
Vanilla plantation (discovery of cultivation)

activities.text: Island tour via the belt road (viewpoints)

visits.text: Coral garden (drifting passage between motu)

activities.text: Guided snorkeling on the coral garden (carrying current)

visits.text: Village of Patio (crafts and wharf)

activities.text: Water taxi Patio ↔ Raiatea (lagoon transit)

visits.text: Temae Beach (white sand and nearby reef)

activities.text: Flight Raiatea → Moorea via Tahiti (inter-island transit)

visits.text: Toatea Belvedere (view of Temae and Tahiti)
Former Club Med beach / Ta'ahiamanu beach

activities.text: Shore snorkeling (seagrass beds and shallow corals)

visits.text: Opunohu pineapple fields (agricultural trails)
Titiroa archaeological site (valley marae)

activities.text: Valley mountain biking/4x4 ride (according to local choice)

visits.text: Moorea belvedere (views over Cook and Opunohu bays)

activities.text: Short hike on three coconut trees trail (round trip)

visits.text: Cook Bay (coastal walk)

activities.text: Boat trip/snorkeling (turtles, rays, blacktip sharks depending on area)

visits.text: West coast (Hauru/Haapiti; beaches and passes)

activities.text: Whale watching (season July-November; at sea if conditions permit)

visits.text: Free time beaches and viewpoints of the east

activities.text: Island road loop (panorama stops and short swims)

visits.text: Temae Beach (morning relaxation)

activities.text: Kayak/paddle lagoon (depending on local rental)

visits.text: Village of Vaitape (discovery of the wharf and waterfront)

activities.text: Flight Moorea/Tahiti → Bora Bora (inter-island transit)

visits.text: Matira Beach (walk and swimming)

activities.text: Lagoon boat tour (rays, reef, coral gardens)

visits.text: Viewpoints of Mount Otemanu (photo stops)

activities.text: Snorkeling at the natural Lagoonarium (depending on conditions and access)

visits.text: Main village of Maupiti (Vai'ea)

visits.text: Motu Auira and sandbanks (walking crossing at low tide if possible)

visits.text: Mont Teurafaatiu (panoramic hike; departure from island center)

activities.text: Sunset over the lagoon (west side beach)

visits.text: Last shopping in town (crafts, local products)
